001package net.tvburger.jdl.linear.optimizer;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Matrices;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedMatrix;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linear.LinearBasisFunctionModel;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
010
011public class L1Regularization<N extends Number> implements GradientDescentOptimizer.Interceptor<N> {
012
013    private N lambda;
014
015    public L1Regularization(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
016        this(typeSupport.zero());
017    }
018
019    public L1Regularization(N lambda) {
020        this.lambda = lambda;
021    }
022
023    public N getLambda() {
024        return lambda;
025    }
026
027    public void setLambda(N lambda) {
028        this.lambda = lambda;
029    }
030
031    @Override
032    public Vector<N> interceptGradients(int epoch, LinearBasisFunctionModel<N> model, DataSet<N> trainSet, GradientDescentOptimizer<N> optimizer, Vector<N> gradients) {
033        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> currentNumberType = model.getCurrentNumberType();
034        N[] parameters = model.getParameters();
035        N[] regularization = currentNumberType.createArray(parameters.length);
036        N negativeLambda = currentNumberType.negate(lambda);
037        for (int p = 0; p < parameters.length; p++) {
038            regularization[p] = currentNumberType.isZero(parameters[p])
039                    ? currentNumberType.zero()
040                    : currentNumberType.positive(parameters[p])
041                    ? lambda : negativeLambda;
042        }
043        return gradients.add(Vectors.of(currentNumberType, regularization).transpose());
044    }
045}
